alert.note: Alert for Leake; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 2:31PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Leake and northern Scott Counties through 315 PM CST... At 231 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Forkville, or 7 miles west of Harperville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hillsboro around 240 PM CST. Harperville around 245 PM CST. Tuscola around 255 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lena, Walnut Grove, Sebastopol and Standing Pine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
